meanings.sent1: The apple was rottener than the banana.
meanings.sent2: The milk smelled rottener as the days went by.
meanings.sent3: The rottener cheese made the whole fridge stink!
meanings.sent4: Her mood grew rottener with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The rottener smell coming from the garbage bin was unbearable.

meanings.definition: One who or that which rots
meanings.sent1: The rottener of the group was responsible for the spoiled food.
meanings.sent2: The rottener in the cellar caused the dampness in the walls.
meanings.sent3: The rottener in the garden turned the vegetables into mush.
meanings.sent4: The rottener in the forest decayed the fallen trees.
meanings.sent5: The rottener in the compost bin helped break down the organic matter.
